name: Path of the Battlerager
description: Battleragers are brutal warriors who embrace spiked armor and reckless aggression, hurling themselves into battle with little regard for safety.

requirements.note: Race requirement is optional if your engine does not enforce racial locks.

3.name: Battlerager Armor
3.description: You can use spiked armor as a weapon. While wearing spiked armor and raging, you can make a melee weapon attack with the spikes as a bonus action, dealing piercing damage.

3.name: Spiked Retribution
3.description: While you are raging and wearing spiked armor, creatures that grapple you or hit you with a melee attack take piercing damage.

6.name: Reckless Abandon
6.description: When you use Reckless Attack while raging, you gain temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier.

10.name: Battlerager Charge
10.description: While raging, you can take the Dash action as a bonus action.

14.name: Improved Spiked Retribution
14.description: The damage dealt by your spiked armor when creatures hit or grapple you increases.
